description:
Solve medical cases. Practice real-world diagnosis. Build clinical confidence.

Atrium is a gamified learning platform where you improve your diagnostic and decision-making skills by solving authentic patient scenarios.

Whether you're just starting clinical work or already in practice, Atrium challenges you to think like a doctor — every day, in just a few minutes.

---

How the Game Works

1. Meet the Patient:
Get a brief with presenting symptoms, history, and vitals.

2. Order Tests:
Select the investigations you think are necessary. Avoid over-testing.

3. Make the Diagnosis:
Choose the correct diagnosis — and add comorbidities when relevant.

4. Treat the Patient:
Decide on the most appropriate next steps for treatment or referral.

5. Get Your Score:
Performance is scored based on diagnostic accuracy and management quality.

---

What You'll Learn

* Clinical reasoning and pattern recognition
* Selecting relevant investigations
* Accurate diagnosis formulation
* Management planning based on diagnosis
* Avoiding common diagnostic pitfalls

Each case ends with a structured Learnings from the Case section, including:

* Correct Diagnosis
* Key Learning Points
* Common Pitfalls
* Things to Remember
* Flashcards for Review

---

Stay Engaged With Gameplay

* Daily Streaks: Build consistency and earn rewards.
* Trophies: Win trophies for mastering specialties, streaks, and milestones.
* Seniority Levels: Rise through medical ranks — from Intern to Super Specialist.
* Streak Freeze: Missed a day? Keep your streak intact with a freeze.
* Leagues: Compete with others and move up or down based on weekly performance.
* XP and Coins: Earn XP and coins for every case you solve — use them to unlock rewards.

---

Why Atrium Works

* Built around real patient workflows
* Designed to simulate decision-making, not just recall
* Quick sessions: solve cases in 2–3 minutes
* Immediate feedback and structured learning
* Created by experienced doctors and educators
* Engaging UI inspired by the best learning apps

This isn't about rote memorization. It's about building habits, making better decisions, and learning to think like a clinician — every single day.

---

Who Should Use Atrium

Atrium is for anyone who wants to sharpen their diagnostic and clinical thinking — whether you're in training, actively practicing, or revisiting clinical medicine after a break.

It's not tied to any curriculum, textbook, or exam. Just practical, day-to-day medicine delivered in an engaging, repeatable format.

---

Start Your Journey Today

You can begin with just one case. But soon, solving cases will become the most powerful habit in your clinical learning.

Download Atrium and try your first case now.

Medical Disclaimer: This app is intended for educational purposes only. It does not provide medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of a qualified healthcare professional before making medical decisions.

Terms of Use: https://www.atrium.clinic/terms_and_conditions.html

Discover the BabyCentre Pregnancy Tracker and Baby App – your perfect companion for pregnancy and parenthood!
Expecting? BabyCentre’s Pregnancy Tracker app is here to guide you every step of the way! Track your pregnancy week by week and day by day with expert pregnancy tips, foetal development videos, and content tailored to your unique pregnancy and parenting journey. Just enter your baby’s due date, and let our pregnancy app bring you personalised guidance, advice, and tools from the start of your pregnancy right through to your baby’s first birthday.
Our BabyCentre Pregnancy and Baby app offers everything you need in one place:
Track your journey with our pregnancy tracker
	•	Get daily updates on how your baby is developing, tailored to your exact stage of pregnancy.
	•	Enjoy a daily news feed with tips on pregnancy nutrition, pregnancy exercise, and pregnancy symptom management.
	•	Weekly pregnancy reminders, pregnancy checklists, and pregnancy insights make staying informed easy and fun!
Instant expert advice for pregnancy at your fingertips
	•	Need answers to your pregnancy questions? Our team of Midwives is here to help with real-time support for any pregnancy questions that come up.
	•	Access hundreds of expert articles on every pregnancy topic from BabyCentre, guiding you from bump to baby.
Join a community of mums and new parents
	•	Connect with mums-to-be in your Birth Club, where you can share, ask, and learn about pregnancy together.
	•	Chat with other parents about baby names, early pregnancy symptoms, baby essentials, and everything else related to pregnancy.
Find the perfect baby name
	•	Looking for a baby name finder? Our Baby Name Tool helps you explore thousands of baby names and meanings for your pregnancy journey.
…and so much more!
	•	Use our due date calculator to track your pregnancy, see interactive foetal development images throughout pregnancy, track your bump in our “Bumpie” pregnancy photo diary, and dive into exclusive “Inside the Uterus” pregnancy videos.
From pregnancy to the first year of your baby’s life, our pregnancy app evolves with you, bringing expert pregnancy advice, a supportive community, and all the essential tools you need for a smooth pregnancy experience.
Download the BabyCentre Pregnancy and Baby App today and enjoy every step of your pregnancy journey!
All health information in our pregnancy app is approved by the BabyCentre Medical Advisory Board and certified by the NHS England Information Standard.
Let's connect! Facebook: facebook.com/BabyCentreUK Instagram: @babycentreuk Twitter: @babycentreuk Pinterest: pinterest.com/babycentre YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3gaQduurXoDOFMSNSKnJVA

*** Most downloaded Contraction Timer app in the world! Number 1 in the UK, USA, Australia, Canada, Italy and elsewhere! ***

This is the simplest-to-use contraction timer. The app will help to track your contractions and determine when it's time to go to the hospital.
If you plan on having a home birth, the app will tell you what stage of labor you are in at any given moment.

Keep track of your labor by tapping a single button at the start and at the end of each contraction. The Contraction Timer analyzes the duration and frequency of contractions and will notify you when it's time to go to the hospital.

Thousands of pregnant women around the world have become mothers using our app.

Always consult your doctor to orient yourself in terms of contraction frequency and duration.
This app is not a medical device and our recomendations are based on standard indicators. Your labor may occur differently. Therefore, do not rely exclusively on our app.
If the duration and frequency of contractions do not yet correspond to the necessary indicators but labor pains become unbearable, it is better to go to the hospital as soon as possible rather than give birth at home or on the way there. Trust what your body is telling you.

If you have any questions or suggestions, please email us at neumandev@gmail.com. Your feedback is very important to us.

Simply point your camera at your blood pressure monitor and let AI instantly capture and analyze your readings. Feeltracker BP combines cutting-edge scanning technology with AI-powered health insights to make cardiovascular tracking effortless—and help you understand what your numbers really mean. Whether you're managing hypertension, monitoring treatment effectiveness, or maintaining heart health, get instant clarity with intelligent analysis you can trust.

COMPREHENSIVE HEART HEALTH TRACKING:
• Log systolic, diastolic, and pulse readings with ease

• AI-powered scanning technology works with Omron and other BP monitor brands
• Track multiple daily readings for accurate averages
• Categorize readings by arm, position, and time of day
• Monitor medication effects on your blood pressure
• Add notes about activities, stress, or symptoms
• AI chat and voice feedback to help you understand your heart health
• AI-powered insights to identify patterns and optimize your cardiovascular wellness

YOUR PRIVACY, PROTECTED:
• No account required—start tracking immediately
• Face ID/Touch ID protection for your health data
• Automatic iCloud sync keeps readings secure across devices
• Export reports in PDF, CSV, Excel, or JSON formats

DESIGNED FOR DAILY MONITORING:
• Beautiful Liquid Glass design with translucent, fluid visual effects
• Eye-friendly Dark Mode for comfortable tracking any time of day
• Color-coded readings show normal, elevated, or high ranges
• Quick-entry widgets for logging from home screen
• Smart reminders for consistent monitoring schedule
• Full integration with Apple Health

UNDERSTAND YOUR HEART HEALTH:
• Detailed trends reveal blood pressure patterns
• Interactive charts—tap any point to view detailed readings instantly
• Weekly and monthly averages for doctor visits
• Identify triggers that affect your readings
• Track improvements from lifestyle changes
• Generate professional reports for healthcare providers

FREE WITH PREMIUM OPTIONS:
• All core tracking features completely free (with ads)
• Upgrade to Premium for an ad-free experience
• Premium users enjoy more AI-powered health insights
• Affordable pricing for lifelong heart health management

Feeltracker is trusted by over 50,000 users monthly across our suite of health tracking apps. Whether you're managing hypertension, monitoring pre-hypertension, tracking post-surgery recovery, or maintaining optimal heart health, Feeltracker BP provides the tools you need for better cardiovascular wellness.

Your heart health matters. Download Feeltracker BP today and start your journey to better blood pressure control.

At Ovia Health by Labcorp, we’re here to empower women at every stage of their health journey—from your period through fertility, pregnancy, postpartum, perimenopause, menopause, and beyond.    With personalized tools and data-driven insights, Ovia empowers women to make informed decisions and access the care they need, whenever they need it.
Whether you're tracking your period, trying to get pregnant, monitoring your pregnancy, recovering postpartum, navigating perimenopause, or tracking your health, join millions of Ovia users.

Consistently rated one of the best women’s health apps, Ovia helps you stay on top of all your women’s health needs – in one trusted place! 

YOUR HEALTH IN YOUR HANDS
◆ Personalized email summaries and reminders to help you make the most of your experience and manage your health
◆ Period & Fertility calendar - Fertility forecasting algorithm predicts your fertility windows & ovulation cycles.
◆ Pregnancy - Baby growth calendar, due date countdown, bump and fetal movement tracker, and more. Watch your baby grow, track your symptoms, and learn what to expect each week.
◆ Postpartum Experience - personalized recovery modes based on delivery (vaginal, c-section, VBAC), symptom tracking, and more.
◆ Perimenopause & Menopause support - comprehensive health tracking for real-time alerts & personalized feedback.
◆ Access over 2,000 free expert articles on fertility, ovulation, conception, postpartum, menopause & reproductive health.

OVULATION CALCULATOR & FERTILITY TRACKER
◆ Fertile window and ovulation time predictions & a daily fertility score. An ovulation app that helps you know when you’re ovulating when trying to conceive (TTC).


PERIOD AND MENSTRUAL CYCLE TRACKER
◆ A period tracker with customizable data logging including symptoms, moods, sex, and nutrition.
◆ Support for regular & irregular menstrual cycles.
◆ Birth control tracking

PREGNANCY & POSTPARTUM
◆ A personalized, 12-month program focused on birth recovery, postpartum conditions and complications, reproductive planning, return to work support, mental health, & more.

PERIMENOPAUSE & MENOPAUSE SUPPORT
◆ Symptom and mood tracking, education, and support to navigate perimenopause & menopause confidently.

STAY UP TO DATE ON YOUR PREGNANCY WITH ESSENTIALS
◆ Pregnancy Week by Week: Know what to expect each week with a baby due date countdown and weekly videos and content about pregnancy symptoms, body changes, & baby tips.
◆ Pregnancy Tracker & Baby Growth Calendar: Compare your baby’s weekly size to a fruit, toy, pastry item, or animal. View 3D illustrations of your baby each week & track baby’s growth.
◆ My Baby Names: Swipe through thousands of baby names. Save your favorites.
◆ Baby Hand & Foot Size: See a life-size image of how big your baby's hands and feet are today compared to how big they'll be at your due date!
◆ Bump Tracker: Keep a record of your growing baby bump.
◆ Safety Lookup Tools: Use lookup tools for symptoms & food safety.
◆ Kick Counter & Contraction Timer: Count baby kicks & contractions as your due date approaches.

OTHER FEATURES OUR MEMBERS LOVE
◆ Friends & Family Sharing: Add your spouse, partner, sibling, or your BFF to share your daily updates.
◆ Privacy & Security: Add an extra layer of protection by adding a PIN to your account.
◆ Apple Health & Fitbit Integrations: Share data from Ovia to the Apple Health app. Sync your Fitbit to share steps, sleep & weight with Ovia.

OVIA HEALTH BY LABCORP
Ovia Health by Labcorp is the leading digital health companion for women across their entire health journey, from general and preventive health through perimenopause and menopause.
Have Ovia Health by Labcorp through your employer or health plan? Download the app, enter your plan info, and access premium tools like health coaching, personalized content, and programs for birth control tracking, endometriosis, PCOS, & more.

CUSTOMER SERVICE
We're always working to improve your experience. Email us: support@oviahealth.com

MDCalc is the leading clinical decision support app providing 900+ evidence-based calculators, risk scores, and clinical tools to support patient care at the bedside. MDCalc has been trusted by millions of clinicians since 2005.

Why Clinicians Choose MDCalc:

• Created by Physicians, for Physicians - All tools developed and validated by board-certified physicians  
• 900+ Clinical Tools - Risk scores, algorithms, dosing calculators, and more with consistent updates and new tools added regularly 
• Works Offline - Full functionality without internet connection  
• Evidence-Based - Every tool includes research validation and expert commentary  
• CME Tracking - Earn CME just by reading through the clinical content surrounding many of our tools
• Free Registration - Complete access in under 30 seconds  

Key Features:

Smart Search & Organization
• Quick search across all tools
• Customizable favorites and specialty lists
• Recently used tools for quick access
• Auto-sync between web and mobile
• Explore page for personalized suggestions

Clinical Expertise
• Expert insights from creators
• Pearls & pitfalls from specialists
• Evidence summaries with PubMed links
• Error warnings and normal value ranges

Workflow Support
• Toggle between US and SI units instantly
• Works in limited connectivity settings
• Easy to use at the point-of-care

Popular Tools Include:
• Creatinine Clearance - Cockcroft-Gault Equation
• HA2DS2-VASc Score - Atrial Fibrillation Stroke Risk
• HEART Score- Major Cardiac Events
• Wells' Criteria - Pulmonary Embolism & DVT
• MELD Score - End-Stage Liver Disease
• HAS-BLED Score - Major Bleeding Risk
• SIRS/Sepsis Criteria - Septic Shock Assessment
• Mean Arterial Pressure - Hemodynamic Monitoring


MDCalc ensures only the highest-quality, clinically relevant tools make it into the app. Each calculator undergoes rigorous evidence appraisal and validation by our network of academic and practicing physician experts.

With the AHA eBook Reader you can read all your American Heart Association (AHA) eBooks online, offline or anytime on your mobile device.

You can log into this eBook reader using the same account information as your AHA account.

How to add AHA eBooks to your AHA eBook Reader
1. Open your AHA eBook Reader.
2. Authorize your eBook Reader using your account information from the AHA eBooks website.
3. Your Bookshelf will show all your purchased books.
4. Click on the title you want to download to your eBook Reader. Your download will start automatically.
5. After download is complete, click on that title to read your eBook on your mobile device.

With your AHA eBook Reader, you can 
- Search in titles
- Sort by category
- Add bookmarks
- Change the font size
- Jump within the text between chapters
- Jump within text to figures, tables, references.
- Preview other AHA eBooks

The American Heart Association is the nation’s oldest, largest voluntary organization devoted to fighting cardiovascular diseases and stroke.

Baby Kick Counter - Kicks helps expectant mothers monitor their baby’s kicks, movements, and pregnancy journey with ease and peace of mind.

Whether you’re relaxing at home or on the go, you can track each kick live or manually, ensuring you stay connected to your baby’s activity patterns. The app also lets you update your Last Menstrual Period (LMP) to automatically calculate your pregnancy progress and gestational age week by week.

Key Features:

Live & Manual Kick Tracking: Count your baby’s kicks in real time or add them manually anytime.
LMP Input: Update your Last Menstrual Period to track your pregnancy progress accurately.
Pregnancy Progress Overview: Know how far along you are and monitor your baby’s growth.
Simple, Intuitive Interface: Designed for expectant mothers to track easily and stress-free.

Stay reassured and in tune with your baby’s movement every step of your pregnancy journey.

Baby Kick Counter - Kicks — Because every kick matters.

Blood Sugar & Diabetes Tracker: Your Comprehensive Health Management Solution
Take control of your health with the Blood Sugar & Diabetes Tracker app, designed to make tracking and managing your health simple, efficient, and accessible. Whether you’re monitoring blood sugar levels, medications, A1C, or weight, this app provides the tools you need for better diabetes management and overall health tracking.
Supporting both mg/dL (American system) and mmol/L (British system), our app ensures global compatibility for your blood sugar log conversions.


Core Features
* Blood Sugar Tracking: Record and analyze your daily and monthly blood sugar levels.
* Medication Tracker: Manage and log your medications using a user-friendly medication library.
* A1C Tracker: Monitor your A1C levels for long-term diabetes management.
* Weight Tracker: Keep track of your weight and analyze trends for better health.
* Detailed Reports: Generate easy-to-read reports to share with your doctor or monitor your progress.
* Reminders for Logs: Stay consistent with your health tracking using custom reminders. 
* Notification Popups: Get timely alerts to ensure you never miss important updates or logs.
* Dark Mode Support: Reduce eye strain with our sleek and stylish dark mode.
* View & Generate Reports Instantly: Generate and view detailed health reports with ease.


Why Choose Blood Sugar & Diabetes Tracker?
Our app is designed for anyone looking to stay on top of their health. Whether you’re tracking your progress, managing medications, or aiming to improve your A1C and weight, we’ve got you covered.
Download the Blood Sugar & Diabetes Tracker app today and start your journey toward better health and smarter diabetes management!

Disclaimer: Blood Sugar & Diabetes Tracker gives healthy lifestyle recommended based on your blood sugar track record and data about your habits. It is not a substitute for healthcare professional and does not provide a medical advice. Reminding users to seek a doctor’s advice in addition to using this app and before making any medical decisions. you must follow your doctor's advice

Baby Tracker features native user interface for both iPhone and iPad, and is the only log for your baby’s health that allows syncing among multiple devices without compromising your privacy.

Designed by busy parents, for busy parents, Baby Tracker offers a simple, streamlined way to track your baby’s daily habits, health, and exciting “firsts” of those precious early days and months. Record feedings, nappy changes, and sleep patterns with a quick one-handed tap, then feel free to go back later and add details and even photos. 

Baby Tracker makes it simple to track all of your child’s important information for doctors and caregivers, as well as share all the exciting milestones of his or her development with friends and family. Perhaps most importantly, Baby Tracker handles all the details so you never have to take significant time away from the joys of parenting. 

Comprehensive Feedings Tracker
* Start and stop nursing timer with one tap for convenience and accuracy
* Settings for nursing, formula, solids, or any combination.
* Track time nursing per breast and total for full nursing session
* Tracks pumping totals as well as feedings
* Notes section allows you to enter details on formula brand, preferences, or allergic response 

Track Nappy Changes
* Summary screen shows time of last changing, along with feedings, and sleep schedule
* Accurate records mean faster response time for concerns like dehydration, constipation, or diarrhea
* Easily share documentation on bowel habits with doctors or caregivers

Sleep Schedule
* Know exactly the date that your baby starts sleeping through the night
* Recognize nap time and nighttime sleep patterns to better plan your day or share with caregivers
* Compare against other data to more easily track down potential causes for baby’s fussiness
* Set alarms for putting baby down or to create more structured nighttime feeding sessions

Growth Records
* Enter measurement data and compare against World Health Organization averages
* See baby’s progress and growth over weeks, months, and years
* Look at logs to compare them for a more comprehensive overview of your baby’s health and wellbeing. 

Milestones
* Make custom categories for baby’s first smile, first tooth, or first step
* Snap a picture on the spot, or add one from your existing library
* Use photos for a gallery-style album of baby’s goals and achievements
* Create an entry with a quick tap, or include journal notes for more detail

Health
* Log medical history such as medications, vaccine shots, and temperature checks

Data Interpretation
* View logged data by day, week, or month
* Shows previous 7 days and previous 30 days
* Quickly identify data patterns, habitual trends, or abnormalities
* Export data via email as a PDF
* Print directly from app to add physical copies to your personal records

Data Sync and Auto Backup
* Works with iCloud or Dropbox for secure, cloud-based auto backup
* Sync data among multiple devices for all caregivers or easy sharing of your baby’s progress with others
* Clone data to another device using AirDrop for a fast transfer that doesn’t eat up your data plan

SmartBP® is a digital blood pressure app that empowers you to record, observe, assess, and share your blood pressure reports utilising iOS devices and the Apple Watch. Moreover, SmartBP interfaces with Apple Health, providing your health data at your fingertips, and enabling you to be proactive in your own wellbeing. For those grappling with prehypertension or hypertension, SmartBP can aid in tracking progress, spotting trends, and managing all your blood pressure and heart measurements, with the ultimate goal of improving your overall cardiovascular health and blood pressure. SmartBP is a more intelligent way to handle your blood pressure readings and track your improvement.

Disclaimer:

- SmartBP permits you to log, track, and evaluate trends in your blood pressure. You can manually input your readings or use a blood pressure monitor to synchronise with SmartBP through Apple Health. SmartBP in itself does not measure blood pressure. A separate blood pressure monitor is required for this.

- SmartBP is NOT a replacement for a doctor or professional healthcare or advice. Any health-related information provided is for informational purposes only and should not be used to substitute the advice of healthcare professionals.

- SmartBP Cloud Sync is not a replacement for backing up your health data. While we strive for the highest data security, no measures can ensure 100% protection. Regular data backups are the user's responsibility.

For guidance on how to use the app, visit our website

Video: www.smartbp.app
FAQ: www.smartbp.app/faq

Features-

- Log your systolic and diastolic blood pressure, pulse rate and weight. Body mass index (BMI), pulse pressure (PP) and mean arterial pressure (MAP) are automatically calculated. Either manually enter measurements or effortlessly sync them with a supported Bluetooth BP monitor.

- Swiftly add notes (e.g. before dinner) and measurement details (e.g. sitting, left arm) utilising tags.

- Store and access all your blood pressure readings anywhere and anytime using Apple HealthKit. Sidestep manual data entry and reduce mistakes by auto-uploading blood pressure readings to HealthKit by auto-syncing with SmartBP. The following Blood Pressure Monitors can link to HealthKit (check for compatibility with different models):

A&D
Omron
Beurer
Braun
Withings

- Share your blood pressure information with your doctor, healthcare provider or family using email, text message (SMS), Apple HealthKit. Create blood pressure reports in PDF format with blood pressure data, graphs and statistics and share with your GP or healthcare provider.

- View a 7, 14, 30-day summary grouped by daily morning/afternoon averages and tags. Create, share and print summary PDF reports and CSV files.

- Print PDF reports or graphs directly

- Analyse your progress through clear graphs and statistics (including mean and variability). Filter data using tags to assess lifestyle changes or medication effectiveness. Compare tagged graphs side by side and observe systolic vs. diastolic blood pressure correlations.

- Track your Heart Rate trends

- Sync ECG records

- Back up your health data and access it on all your mobile devices with SmartBP Cloud.  This is an optional service. We do not sell your health data.

- Sync directly between iPhone and iPad through Bluetooth or WiFi without sharing on the cloud.

- Back up blood pressure data by exporting to Dropbox, and Drive, or import from CSV files into the app.

- Protect your data with TouchID, FaceID or Pin keypad protection.

- Set medication reminders & track effectiveness.

- Intuitive colour coded data to identify normal, prehypertensive, stage I and II hypertension. These limits can be modified. Categorise your records based on 2017 ACA/AHA, 2023 ESC/ESH or create your own custom categories.

- Create multiple user profiles and manage them from a single app/device.

- Both US and international height and weight units are supported.

New topics, more content! Daily Anatomy Flashcards teaches healthcare students the 500 most important anatomical structures in a beginner-friendly format. The perfect entry into the world of anatomy!

*Reach your goals*

Starting to learn anatomy can be overwhelming, but it shouldn't be. Daily Anatomy can be used without any prior knowledge. It starts with the basics, and challenges your brain more and more over time. Learning with  Daily Anatomy is not only about repetition. It introduces information in varying forms. Solving a problem in different ways helps you memorize information longer-term and finally be able to fully absorb it. Whether on your next exam, or in your medical professional career, all the anatomy structures will be at hand. No more thinking. Just knowing.

*What will you learn?*

With Daily Anatomy you learn all the important structures of human anatomy. This includes bones, muscles, nerves, vessels and specific points on the bones.

Instead of many thin arrows pointing at various structures, each structure is clearly highlighted in green in its entirety. This way you can easily identify and memorize both shape and location.

*How to stay motivated and not forget*

Whether you need to learn lists of information, or for instance, every muscle and bone in the human body including how they function together, there is a method really works to help you out. The bonus is that this method doesn't stress you out either because you get to take lots of breaks.

It's called spaced repetition, and it's the way to go for knowledge that sticks in your cranium.

By using spaced repetition, you work through a series of increasing intervals of time between studying what you've previously learned. This method utilizes the psychological spacing effect, which occurs when you are going back over information that you have already learned in order to remember it better. Spaced repetition works well for lists of items or new vocabularies such as medical terminology.

Daily Anatomy has built-in spaced repetition, so you learn as efficiently and effectively as you can.

MyTherapy is your daily companion for pill reminders and many other features related to taking your medication and documenting your health. Millions of people use MyTherapy to be reminded to take the right medications at the right time.

MyTherapy supports you in sticking to your personalized medication plan. You receive reminders for the scheduled medication times. If you wish, you can record measurements, symptoms, and doctor visits in the integrated patient diary.

● EASY SETUP: Search our medication database or simply type in your specific medication to create your customizable reminders.

● STREAKS: Develop healthy routines by tracking how many days in a row you complete your health tasks. Each completed task strengthens your streak.

● MONTHLY OVERVIEW: Automatically maintain a health journal—a valuable resource for your next doctor's visit.

● INJECTION SITE TRACKING: Users who inject medication can easily rotate and document injection sites within the app.

● PARTICULARLY HELPFUL for people living with chronic or recurring health conditions such as:

… and many more.

● PRIVACY & SECURITY: We’re certified to international standards including ISO 13485 and ISO 27001—because your data deserves the highest protection.

● EXCELLENT APP: Winner of the German Health Award by news channel N-TV and the German Institute for Service Quality (09/2023).

Tracking your baby’s movements is an important part of a healthy pregnancy—and now it’s easier than ever. Our Baby Kick Counter app helps expectant parents monitor and log baby kicks in a simple, intuitive way. Whether you’re counting kicks during a session or keeping a daily log, this app makes it easy to stay in tune with your baby’s activity and recognize important patterns over time.

Designed with guidance from moms and healthcare professionals, the app offers a gentle, stress-free way to track your baby’s movements and share that data with your care team if needed. Whether you’re a first-time parent or experienced, the app supports your journey with useful features that keep things organized and reassuring.

Key Features:

Kick Tracking Made Easy
Start a kick session anytime and tap to log each movement. Whether it's a flutter, roll, or strong kick, you can track them all with a single tap.

Session Summaries
See how long each session lasted, how many kicks you counted, and how your baby's activity varies from day to day.

Calendar View
Easily view past kick sessions on an interactive calendar. This helps you notice trends, compare days, and maintain a consistent routine.

Add Notes & Feelings
Attach notes or feelings to any session—record how you're feeling, describe the kicks, or note anything out of the ordinary. It's perfect for creating a record you can refer back to or discuss during appointments.

Reminders & Notifications (optional)
Set gentle reminders to check in daily, helping you maintain a regular tracking routine throughout your pregnancy.

Safe, Private, and Secure
Your data stays private. We don’t collect or share your personal information.

Why Track Baby Kicks?
Healthcare providers often recommend tracking kicks starting around the third trimester to ensure your baby’s movement patterns stay consistent. A noticeable change in activity may be worth discussing with your doctor. Our app helps make this process simple and stress-free.

Simple, Thoughtful Design
Built for ease of use, the app features a clean design and calming interface, so you can focus on connecting with your baby rather than figuring out complicated tools.

Whether you're just starting to track or you're deep into your third trimester, the Baby Kick Counter app helps you feel more informed, connected, and reassured.
